title:
Including exclusive heavy vector-meson production data in a global
  parton analysis
authors: C. A. Flett, A. D. Martin, M. G. Ryskin and T. Teubner
abstract:
We perform a parton analysis within $\texttt{xFitter}$ to determine the gluon
parton distribution function (PDF) at next-to-leading order (NLO) at
moderate-to-low $x$ using the measurements of exclusive $J/\psi$ production in
$ep$ and $pp$ collisions from HERA and LHC. We further study the constraints
from the corresponding $\Upsilon$ production process and finish by discussing
the possible effects at next-to-next-to-leading order (NNLO) through
incorporation of a $K$ factor for the exclusive heavy vector-meson coefficient
function at NLO.
